website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for consumers who want a dependable light with unique, "old school" styling.
pros: A flexible light that stands out for its solid wood body and retro design
Owners rave about its looks and simple functions
cons: Doesn't offer the modern features of others we considered, but if the style appeals to you, chances are this isn't an issue

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It is exactally what j was looking for, for my plants light. I replaced the bulb with a 60w 5000k led light bulb as a grow light for my babies. The lamp says only 40w, but it's been working just fine with the led 60w. Led doesn't get hot, so there is no chance in burning the lamp shade. The lamp is the perfect size and you can adjust how tall it is and paint the shape how you want it (up and down) The only thing I don't like is that the cord is not white.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Megehee

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp  but watch for assembly defect.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in April 2020. There is a defect in the design so I set it aside for later—which turns out to be much later. Today I finally went to Lowe’s to find a tool to fix it. I discovered one of the holes was not big enough for the screw. Two gentlemen who work at Lowe’s explained the problem. The hole was made bigger and the screw was stripped of an unnecessary object on the screw. Lowe’s put it together for me. I’m glad I didn’t return it to Amazon. I love the lamp and I love Lowes for helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Completes our desk.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this lamp so far. I think you're safe ignoring the older reviews about the droopy lamp arms. My husband put it together without looking at the instructions and it's perfect. It's a really nice weight and it feels like good quality. I'm really pleased, good quality for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: R Landers

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp, I purchased 2. They are very easy to put together and look very nice. Only one small flaw, I wish it was as adjustable as it looks. Adjustments are very limited. Regardless I love them just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp 1 year ago and have been pretty happy with it, until today when the lamp switch casing inexplicably broke in two (I don't ever move this lamp, it sits on my bedside table). Even worse, when the pieces came apart, it exposed wires that shocked me! Too bad, I liked the design, but obviously cannot tolerate something that so easily degrades into a dangerous object.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of these lamps.
customer_reviews.text: Wish Tomons had different options other than wood, but the white looks amazing. Very sturdy, nothing feels cheaply made for the price. I would highly recommend these, im glad I purchased 2. Couple things to note; they don't swivel. they can go up and down but that's basically it. the wiring is very stiff also.
customer_reviews.author: cmisi

customer_reviews.title: Quality failure needed to return
customer_reviews.text: I got this as gift - I really wanted it but had to return because the holes pre-drilled didn’t line up and so lamp parts could not fit together. I don’t understand how this could happen to machine drilled pieces - there are only three parts. Maybe it was a faulty machine set up and no one checked before shipping. I’m going to reorder and hope for a better result. Updated 1/13/2018 Received replacement today and changed my review from one star to for stars.
customer_reviews.author: INTJ

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Amazon inspection. Do not buy used.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely atrocious, Amazon. Do not sell usernames broken lamps that you claim are in good condition. Such a waste of time for me to assemble only to find out the head is completely, irreparably detached from the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp except for drilling problem
customer_reviews.text: Really nice lamp except for the fact that the hole where the top screw is supposed to be placed is crooked! Because of this the two pieces of wood do not lay flush and if the top piece isn't bent back it will fall down. I fixed it partially by adding two jelly spacers that came with it. Other than that the bulb and the whole design is beautiful; I just wish the wood was flush.
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Handsome lamp, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this lamp so much that he purchased two of them, one for home and one for his dorm. Be careful to follow directions included in the packaging when you are tightening screws to adjust the position of the arms, so you don't damage the wood.
customer_reviews.author: jonesparg

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, liked it, and picked up another. I also got some 14W Philips (100W replacement) bulbs:  . The 4W bulbs that come with these are useful for some situations. The 14w Philips bulbs really light up a room!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks expensive and sturdy! It looks amazing on a desk, we had an issue with the first lamp we ordered and customer service was amazing, they sent a new lamp in 2 days and we had a UPS pick up for the first lamp. For the price no need to look elsewhere! Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia O.

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: This light is simple and looks good on my desk. I'm happy with the quality. The cord is a little stiff and hasn't "relaxed" at all in the 9 months I've been using it, but it's not a big enough complaint to lose a star over.
customer_reviews.author: B Thornton

customer_reviews.title: lamp arm assembly holes were not drilled properly
customer_reviews.text: the middle pivot hole where the wing nuts and bolts connect was not drilled correctly, so it doesn't fit together, and it causes the arm to collapse and not stay up properly. The light is pretty dim as well. I had to return it. it's a nice looking lamp, but it won't stay up due to the drill holes.
customer_reviews.author: DiannaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what the issues are, I was able to set up both lamps in about 5 minutes - didn't need the microscopic instructions. Just make sure to put plastic washer next to wooden arm, then metal, then screw. Base is heavy and well constructed. Doesn't come with bulbs. They look great but definitely for reading in bed or working at a desk - task lighting. They do not light up a room. I'm very pleased as they are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I agree with the people that say the lamp sinks, but it is so cute that I can overlook that. Like one customer stated, the sinking can be rectified by putting an inexpensive washer in the loose joint. I love the "Scandie" design. My husband put it together in less than 10 min., I am sure it would have been more challenging for me to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: EVEIE 17

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and gorgeous of a lamp. I like to light things up in my room with it - in a beautiful and gorgeous way. The best part is I already had a plug in the wall right where I wanted to put it. Beautiful and gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: The Original Hot Dogs Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp, went prefectly with my desk and very easy to set up. Looks exactly like the picture, was a little unstable so you definitely have to tighten each part to ensure it stays standing.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyAO

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lamp but won't support heavier bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a grow lamp but it couldn't support the weight of the GE Par38 Grow light, it would either tip over or the head wold droop all the way down. I still love the look of this lamp and do not mind having it. I'm sure I can find a place for it.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the lamp is pretty and the lighting bulb is good for reading and study.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cute Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp, I really needed something for my desk and this light is the perfect fit. I love the design, it's super cute, and obviously makes reading my textbooks a lot easier when it gets dark outside. Love my Tomons lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Camilia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp and am so impressed. The design and quality is great and for a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Linde

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, bad QA
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself looks great. Unfortunately the pin and the hole on the base was about 5mm off so the two pieces won't fit. Needed to drill an extra hole. Looks like a QA issue.
customer_reviews.author: sebm

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The joints don't make a ton of sense when you're putting it together. They also don't bend a whole lot, limiting how you can position it. Otherwise it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp and it's neat design. Although I do wish it could rotate on the z-axis, as in turn the lamp head left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design for my office/sewing room. It has a contemporary, rustic, industrial feel all at once. Nice bright bulb even though it's a 40W. Well made and sturdy - even the thin base which makes it seem less bulky. It looks great on the desk I just purchased from Amazon. I'm contemplating purchasing another of this or of the same Tomons brand. Highly recommend. Oh - and the covered cord - that's just another great design feature.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! The natural wood is very attractive and it works great as my night time reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Drews

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lamp, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive lamp, and I liked having it on my desk. After the initial set up I did not adjust the screws very much, because I liked the position it was in. After about two months, however, the screws stopped holding at the joints, and the lamp collapsed and the head of the lamp hit my computer. I readjusted and it held for a day before falling again.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, sturdy and well made, and works with Hue bulbs
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk lamp. Not only it fits perfectly on my desk but I love the vintage wire sleeve. On a side note, the LED lamp provided is not a warm white (~2500K-2700K). I personally do not like cool white, I find it tiring and not cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Ettrai

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our new streamlined home office. Love the quality and Scandinavian design influence!
customer_reviews.author: OnARoll

customer_reviews.title: Great Nordic Modern Design
customer_reviews.text: The lamp has great curves and overall Nordic Modern design. The wood frame is sturdy and adds an organic feeling to the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lamp
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Some reviewers noted that the lamp would sag or not stay up. We noted that in the instructions it says that before adjusting the lamp you should loosen the bolts and then re tighten them. Failing to do this will damage the wood and make the joints loose.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kuruvilla

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase this lamp because of all the reviews that mentioned faulty joint issues. I'm glad I took the risk. The quality is great and I've had it for months with no problems (the company included extra washers which I'll keep, but don't expect to need). It's attractive, sturdy, and was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Edmisten

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, super cute for any modern desk! Using it for my art desk.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sharooni

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped it was. Great product, well crafted. Will update review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Functional and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, functional and easy to assemble -- I am very pleased with the two lamps I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: let there be light
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp. I needed some extra light for sewing and this does the trick! And I think it's cute. And it came with a bulb! Very handy
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is dope. Have one at home and just bought another for work.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Great! ...as long as you don't need something super bright.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lamp! Its so cute! I love the warmth of the wood and the stylized cord. Plus, the price is great for this quality product. My only (very minor) complaint is that it doesn't support higher wattage bulbs. It's quite possible I'd find a higher wattage bulb too bright, but it would be nice to have the option without concern of creating a hazard. Especially if I used this lamp for tedious tasks with small items I would want it to be brighter, but as I don't, this works just great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Lamp! Looks Great, works nice. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. It looks even better then on the pictures. The only thing I did is remove the rubber o-ring on the base to make sure the lamp doesn't tilt down all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Constantin

customer_reviews.title: Biutiful and quality design
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It is very sturdy, is easy to assemble and looks sublime on my desk. I would recommend following the advices from the manufacturer on the box: you should unscrew the parts a bit before moving it, or the lamp might fall down with time. It is quality wood, so you should take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy GORSZCZYK

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp but it very easily loses its place ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp but it very easily loses its place and you have to adjust the screws a bit often.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Description claims to be of Scandinavian origins but made in China
customer_reviews.author: David B Floyd

customer_reviews.title: i love this light
customer_reviews.text: i see some reviews that say its not strong enough to stand. i purchased this and it sits here on my desk and have had no problems with balance or standing. i love this light, all functions about it. very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: donna k.

customer_reviews.title: Liked the wood and white together
customer_reviews.text: Cute lamp. Used for office space and wanted something a little different. Liked the wood and white together. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: T. S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The lamp looks cute! Interesting design yet functional. Clear instructions for assembling. The only reason I did not give five stars to durability is that you may need to take extra care to extend the using time since it is made of wood. Anyway I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Most awesome lamp! Well built. Top quality you will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AlaskANNA

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Very rustic looking wood. It wasn't as pictured but customer service was great in working with me to return it. If you want wood and don't mind it not being a polished look this may be for you. It seemed well made.
customer_reviews.author: Barbmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute little side table lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Nice side table lamp. The lightbulbs that they come with are super bright and kind of awful. Plan to replace. Other than that this is a pretty little side table lamp. Modern and minimalist.
customer_reviews.author: Mainebuyer

customer_reviews.title: The world’s best lamp
customer_reviews.text: The base is heavy so it won’t tip over, and the joints tighten so that the lamp does not sag! Nice quality wood and metal throughout and nice note in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are so cute in my kids rooms! Very sturdy and bright and look good with most decor.
customer_reviews.author: Siesmon

customer_reviews.title: Bulb broke before use.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp looks and feels great, however the bulb completely twisted off its base when installing.
customer_reviews.author: Korey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable !
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lamp. Was easy to put together. It's adorable and functional. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Very quality and sturdy! I love
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten so many compliments on this lamp! Very quality and sturdy! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much I got 2
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much I got 2. Sturdy and adjustable. I also use the base as a coaster.
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Berardi

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it and the base was cracked so I returned it and I'm very happy with how it looks. It's not made cheaply and was pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Garcia

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: i didn't realize the quality of the product. it has great weight to the base. the assembly was kinda fun! i like the black and white cable snaking through the wood arm.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute, fits in perfectly on my bedside table and is really good quality. Definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea L

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional design. Liked it so much, I purchased two for different spaces. Only concern is that one of the switches is a little faulty. Could it be that the lamp is being used too much? Anyway, it's still in very good condition more than a year later and is easy to clean. The lamp also works with small energy efficient light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Y

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn't work in my space
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute lamp. Note that it is unfinished wood and not gold.
customer_reviews.author: Sagey

customer_reviews.title: but it's pretty sturdy and I'm sure it will just get dented ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute lamp for my workshop. I'm dreading the day I pull it onto my concrete floor, as I'm not sure how well it will fare, but it's pretty sturdy and I'm sure it will just get dented and not totally smashed like an el cheap-o lamp. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James M Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality so will be ordering more to use as bedside lights. Assembled easily enough. Comes with light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this lamp. It looks so chic and is great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I really like the wood design
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wood design. I thought the white "cone" will look cheap in person, but it didn't look that way. It's pretty solid metal cone. The only downside is that the on/off switch is not at the apex of the cone, instead it's on the wire a few inches from the base of the lamp, so it's not so convenient to switch it on/off at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Beautiful. Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than expected. It’s beautiful and really brings a pop of excitement to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Collin T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but shorter than other architectural lamps. Needed more height
customer_reviews.text: Nice look but shorter than other architectural lamps. Needed more height
customer_reviews.author: meb

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!! Simple, easy to put together, good quality, and looks great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jshot

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, good quality and had no problem assembling ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp, good quality and had no problem assembling it. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a stylish, reasonably priced desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great product for the price, nice design, work great, doesnt look cheap, stands firm,
customer_reviews.author: juana ezcurra

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, easy to assemble and sturdy. This stylish lamp is a nice addition to my home office.
customer_reviews.author: L. N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this lamp was worth telling you all how amazing it is. Its sturdy, heavy ans good quality materials. Couldnt be easier to put together and its beatiful.
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Milberg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice but the arm doesn't stay up quite as high as I want it
customer_reviews.text: Good and lightweight but flexibility of the arms are limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, fast shipping, dodgy packaging
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, beautiful, easy to put together, you cant beat the price. Came with free 1 day shipping. The box wasnt tapped shut so I think I got a little lucky that nothing was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Absher

customer_reviews.title: Unusable.  Going to throw it away. A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Kept collapsing. I kept tightening the screws to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: maryanna hite

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the light is slightly too heavy for the screw tighten. It kind of saggy
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Very sophisticated look
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, great illumination. Very worth of the money you spend.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Rocafort

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. I have not had any issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. I have not had any issues with is drooping, even with a relatively heavy hue bulb in it. It's surprisingly well built.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect lamp for the price! Stylish and contemporary. Was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Marina P.

customer_reviews.title: Box delivered open with no directions!
customer_reviews.text: Box came open, no tape no nothing on box as well as with no directions ! Unclear how to assemble with no directions !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Just what I was looking for. It was easy to put together, and looks great, even in my fairly feminine and traditional bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Simple and durable, I have found this lamp perfect for my desk; both for studying and as a soft light for evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good light. I like it, which the black one was not available when I purchased the light! I bought the white one, but this light is good!
customer_reviews.author: Kaiwen Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful desk lamp. Perfect in a small space to light up work area. Great appearance. Sturdy base. Joints hold well. The cord is covered with a neat black and white fabric. It's really a nice little lamp and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bit pricey for a desk lamp, but very much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bohabbash

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great for the price, easy to assemble, perfectly balanced so it doesn't tripped over. I am totally happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Nor1

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bright lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright little lamp! Looks just like expected, sturdy base.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I bought 2 and they are great quality. They are also easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: it matched my desk
customer_reviews.text: Really solid product, looks great, but it needs to take a larger lite bulb
customer_reviews.author: David E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp
customer_reviews.text: This funky little lamp strikes just the right design note in my seaside cottage. It appears to be very well made and functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G. Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: European plug? Updated
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, but a European plug? Is this a mistake? HELP! Update: after writing this review, I was contacted by the company and sent another lamp, with a us plug. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without the base section so need to send them back!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great and easy to assemble. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Berry

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very nice appearance
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very high quality, and when assembled correctly holds its position securely. I suspect all of the complaints regarding drooping is due to incorrect assembly. See the diagram posted by a purchaser on this review site.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Who designed this?
customer_reviews.text: Who designed this. Terrible instructions and the nuts and bolts don’t even fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Beal

customer_reviews.title: Bulb stopped working within 20minutes
customer_reviews.text: The lamp overall looks very good. However, within 20 minutes of the use, the bulb stopped working. It was very disappointing to know after paying a good amount for the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: raghav

customer_reviews.title: NEVER CAME and NEVER GOT A REFUND!
customer_reviews.text: NEVER CAME! SENT EMAIL TO SELLER BUT ITS BEEN FIVE DAYS AND STILL NO RESPONSR!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice desk lamp. The design stands careful appreciation. It also works properly as a typical desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mais

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, I like the wood swim arm
customer_reviews.text: Very good lamp, it's exactly what I want. The swim arm is very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great quality, great aesthetic, great value
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing find, especially for the price of it super easy to assemble looks great!

product_meta.title: Tomons Swing Arm Desk Lamp, Wood LED Table Lamp, Reading Lights for Office, College Dorm, Living Room, Bedroom, Study, Bedside Nightstand Adjustable Lamp with 4W LED Bulb - White
feature_bullets: 【Nature Wood Frame】The body is made of solid wood, firm and chemical-free. The cable is covered with nylon, stronger and more flexible.
【Modern Style】 Classic Solid wood meets iron, simple and classic style. Ideal for office, college dorm, reading room, living room, bedroom, study , bedside.

【Adjustable Design】Easy to use and store. The desk lamp is adjustable and tool free set up. You can adjust the angle and height as you wish. With the separable design, it can be stored in a small space.
【Specification】110-220V rated power, E26 Screw socket. An E26 LED light bulb is included (3300k / 4w), comfortable light , more eye-care
【Package】1 x Tomons desk lamp DL1001, 1 x 4W E26 Bulb, 1 x user manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars425 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
